version_description:
- Adds leaderboards for top soldiers
- Adds friendly fire prevention to all control types
- Improvements to sounds
- Made Eraser more powerful
- Other improvements

This app has been updated by Apple to use the latest Apple signing certificate.

MAJOR UPDATE:
- Major Improvements to controls
- Quick Match Added
- All New Menus
- New Leaderboards
- GameCenter Achievements
- Major Changes to Weapons and Damage
- Cloud Save for Diamonds and No Ads, requires login with GameCenter of Facebook
- A lot of bugs fixed
